author: Christos Emmanouilidis and A. Hunter and Dr J. MacIntyre
title: A Multiobjective Evolutionary Setting for Feature Selection and a Commonality-Based Crossover Operator
venue: Centre for Adaptive Systems, School of Computing, Engineering and Technology University of Sunderland
window: the individual features distribution during evolution (Figure 5, lower row). Once feature selection is completed, final MLP models are built, based on the training and validation data. The sonar data set and, to a lesser extent the ionoshpere, is so sparse that employing a large number of hidden units seems to lead to overfit. Both MLP and PNN models are tested on the independent evaluation data. 0
